Class DescribedDataSet

java.lang.Object
DataHolders.DescribedDataSet
public class DescribedDataSet extends Object
This class holds lists of DescribedDataPoints for sorting and analyzing them
Version:
1.0.0

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DescribedDataSet(String ind, String dep)
    Creates a DescribedDataSet with an empty dataList and matching independent and dependent units
    DescribedDataSet(ArrayList<DescribedDataPoint> d)
    Creates a DescribedDataSet matching the given ArrayList, with matching units
